   20: 
   21: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   22: %%% File    : erl_link_SUITE.erl
   23: %%% Author  : Rickard Green <rickard.green@uab.ericsson.se>
   24: %%% Purpose : Test erlang links
   25: %%% Created : 13 Dec 2001 by Rickard Green <rickard.green@uab.ericsson.se>
   26: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   27: 
   28: -module(erl_link_SUITE).
   29: -author('rickard.green@uab.ericsson.se').
   30: 
   31: %-define(line_trace, 1).
   32: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   33: 
   34: -export([all/0, suite/0, init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1]).
   35: 
   36: % Test cases
   37: -export([links/1,
   38:          dist_links/1,
   39:          monitor_nodes/1,
   40:          process_monitors/1,
   41:          dist_process_monitors/1,
   42:          busy_dist_port_monitor/1,
   43:          busy_dist_port_link/1,
   44:          otp_5772_link/1,
   45:          otp_5772_dist_link/1,
   46:          otp_5772_monitor/1,
   47:          otp_5772_dist_monitor/1,
   48:          otp_7946/1,
   49:          otp_17127_local_link_with_simultaneous_link_unlink/1,
   50:          otp_17127_dist_link_with_simultaneous_link_unlink/1,
   51:          otp_17127_local_random/1,
   52:          otp_17127_dist_random/1]).
   53: 
   54: -export([init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2]).
   55: 
   56: % Internal exports
   57: -export([test_proc/0]).
   58: 
   59: 
   60: -record(erl_link, {type,           % process | port | dist_process
   61:                    pid = [],
   62:                    state,          % linked | unlinking
   63:                    id}).
   64: 
   65: % This is to be kept in sync with erl_bif_info.c (make_monitor_list)
   66: 
   67: -record(erl_monitor, {type,        % process | port | time_offset | dist_process | resource | node | nodes | suspend
   68:                       dir,         % origin | target
   69:                       ref,         % Reference | []
   70:                       pid,         % Process or nodename
   71:                       extra = []}). % registered name, integer or, []
   72: 
   73: 
   74: suite() ->
   75:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   76:      {timetrap, {minutes, 1}}].
   77: 
   78: all() -> 
   79:     [links, dist_links, monitor_nodes, process_monitors,
   80:      dist_process_monitors, busy_dist_port_monitor,
   81:      busy_dist_port_link, otp_5772_link, otp_5772_dist_link,
   82:      otp_5772_monitor, otp_5772_dist_monitor, otp_7946,
   83:      otp_17127_local_link_with_simultaneous_link_unlink,
   84:      otp_17127_dist_link_with_simultaneous_link_unlink,
   85:      otp_17127_local_random, otp_17127_dist_random].
   86: 
   87: init_per_testcase(Func, Config) when is_atom(Func), is_list(Config) ->
   88:     case catch erts_debug:get_internal_state(available_internal_state) of
   89:         true -> ok;
   90:         _ -> erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, true)
   91:     end,
   92:     Config.
   93: 
   94: end_per_testcase(_Func, Config) ->
   95:     erts_test_utils:ept_check_leaked_nodes(Config).
   96: 
   97: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   98:     Config.
   99: 
  100: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
  101:     catch erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, false).
  102: 
  103: 
  104: %% Tests node local links
  105: links(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  106:     common_link_test(node(), node()),
  107:     true = link(self()),
  108:     [] = find_erl_link(self(), process, self()),
  109:     true = unlink(self()),
  110:     ok.
  111: 
  112: %% Tests distributed links
  113: dist_links(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  114:     {ok, _Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
  115:     rpc:call(Node, erts_debug, set_internal_state, [available_internal_state, true]),
  116:     common_link_test(node(), Node),
  117:     TP4 = spawn(?MODULE, test_proc, []),
  118:     TP5 = spawn(?MODULE, test_proc, []),
  119:     TP6 = spawn(Node, ?MODULE, test_proc, []),
  120:     io:format("TP4=~p~nTP5=~p~nTP6=~p~n", [TP4, TP5, TP6]),
  121: 
  122:     true = tp_call(TP6, fun() -> link(TP4) end),
  123:     check_link(TP4, TP6),
  124:     true = tp_call(TP5,
  125:                    fun() ->
  126:                            process_flag(trap_exit,true),
  127:                            link(TP6)
  128:                    end),
  129:     check_link(TP5, TP6),
  130:     rpc:cast(Node, erlang, halt, []),
  131:     wait_until(fun () -> is_proc_dead(TP4) end),
  132:     check_unlink(TP4, TP6),
  133:     true = tp_call(TP5,
  134:                    fun() ->
  135:                            receive
  136:                                {'EXIT', TP6, noconnection} ->
  137:                                    true
  138:                            end
  139:                    end),
  140:     check_unlink(TP5, TP6),
  141:     tp_cast(TP5, fun() -> exit(normal) end),
  142:     ok.
  143: 
  144: common_link_test(NodeA, NodeB) ->
  145:     TP1 = spawn(NodeA, ?MODULE, test_proc, []),
  146:     check_unlink(TP1, self()),
  147:     TP2 = tp_call(TP1,
  148:                   fun () ->
  149:                           spawn_link(NodeB, ?MODULE, test_proc, [])
  150:                   end),
  151:     check_link(TP1, TP2),
  152:     true = tp_call(TP2, fun() -> unlink(TP1) end),
  153:     check_unlink(TP1, TP2),
  154:     true = tp_call(TP2, fun() -> link(TP1) end),
  155:     check_link(TP1, TP2),
  156:     false = tp_call(TP2, fun() -> process_flag(trap_exit, true) end),
  157:     tp_cast(TP1, fun () -> exit(died) end),
  158:     true = tp_call(TP2, fun() ->
  159:                                 receive 
  160:                                     {'EXIT', TP1, died} ->
  161:                                         true
  162:                                 end
  163:                         end),
  164:     check_unlink(TP1, TP2),
  165:     TP3 = tp_call(TP2,
  166:                   fun () ->
  167:                           spawn_link(NodeA, ?MODULE, test_proc, [])
  168:                   end),
  169:     check_link(TP3, TP2),
  170:     tp_cast(TP2, fun() -> exit(died) end),
  171:     wait_until(fun () -> is_proc_dead(TP3) end),
  172:     check_unlink(TP3, TP2),
  173:     ok.
  174: 
  175: %% Tests monitor of nodes
  176: monitor_nodes(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  177:     {ok, PeerA, A} = ?CT_PEER(),
  178:     {ok, PeerB, B} = ?CT_PEER(),
  179:     [_, HostName] = string:lexemes(atom_to_list(node()), "@"),
  180:     C = list_to_atom(peer:random_name(?MODULE_STRING) ++ "@" ++ HostName),
  181:     D = list_to_atom(peer:random_name(?MODULE_STRING) ++ "@" ++ HostName),
  182:     0 = no_of_monitor_node(self(), A),
  183:     0 = no_of_monitor_node(self(), B),
  184:     monitor_node(A, true),
  185:     monitor_node(B, true),
  186:     monitor_node(D, true),
  187:     monitor_node(D, true),
  188: 
  189:     %% Has been known to crash the emulator.
  190:     {memory,_} = process_info(self(), memory),
  191: 
  192:     monitor_node(A, false),
  193:     monitor_node(B, true),
  194:     monitor_node(C, true),
  195:     receive after 1000 -> ok end,
  196:     monitor_node(C, false),
  197:     monitor_node(C, true),
  198:     monitor_node(B, true),
  199:     monitor_node(A, false),
  200:     monitor_node(B, true),
  201:     monitor_node(B, false),
  202:     monitor_node(A, true),
  203:     check_monitor_node(self(), A, 1),
  204:     check_monitor_node(self(), B, 3),
  205:     ok = receive {nodedown, C} -> ok after 1000 -> timeout end,
  206:     %%OTP-21: monitor_node(_,false) does not trigger auto-connect anymore
  207:     %%        and therefore no nodedown if it fails.
  208:     %%ok = receive {nodedown, C} -> ok after 1000 -> timeout end,
  209:     ok = receive {nodedown, C} -> ok after 1000 -> timeout end,
  210:     ok = receive {nodedown, D} -> ok after 1000 -> timeout end,
  211:     ok = receive {nodedown, D} -> ok after 1000 -> timeout end,
  212:     check_monitor_node(self(), C, 0),
  213:     check_monitor_node(self(), D, 0),
  214: 
  215:     peer:stop(PeerA),
  216:     receive {nodedown, A} -> ok end,
  217:     check_monitor_node(self(), A, 0),
  218:     check_monitor_node(self(), B, 3),
  219:     peer:stop(PeerB),
  220:     receive {nodedown, B} -> ok end,
  221:     receive {nodedown, B} -> ok end,
  222:     receive {nodedown, B} -> ok end,
  223:     check_monitor_node(self(), B, 0),
  224:     receive
  225:         {nodedown, X} ->
  226:             ct:fail({unexpected_nodedown, X})
  227:     after 0 ->
  228:               ok
  229:     end,
  230:     ok.
  231: 
  232: 
  233: %% Tests node local process monitors
  234: process_monitors(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  235:     common_process_monitors(node(), node()),
  236:     Mon1 = erlang:monitor(process,self()),
  237:     [] = find_erl_monitor(self(), Mon1),
  238:     Name = list_to_atom(lists:concat([?FUNCTION_NAME,
  239:         integer_to_list(erlang:unique_integer([positive]))])),
  240:     true = register(Name, self()),
  241:     Mon2 = erlang:monitor(process, Name),
  242:     [] = find_erl_monitor(self(), Mon2),
  243:     receive
  244:         {'DOWN', Mon1, _, _, _} = Msg ->
  245:             ct:fail({unexpected_down_msg, Msg});
  246:         {'DOWN', Mon2, _, _, _} = Msg ->
  247:             ct:fail({unexpected_down_msg, Msg})
  248:     after 500 ->
  249:               true = erlang:demonitor(Mon1),
  250:               true = erlang:demonitor(Mon2),
  251:               ok
  252:     end.
  253: 
  254: %% Tests distributed process monitors
  255: dist_process_monitors(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  256:     {ok, _Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
  257:     rpc:call(Node, erts_debug, set_internal_state, [available_internal_state, true]),
  258:     common_process_monitors(node(), Node),
  259:     TP1 = spawn(Node, ?MODULE, test_proc, []),
  260:     R1 = erlang:monitor(process, TP1),
  261:     TP1O = get_down_object(TP1, self()),
  262:     check_process_monitor(self(), TP1, R1),
  263:     tp_cast(TP1, fun () -> halt() end),
  264:     receive
  265:         {'DOWN',R1,process,TP1O,noconnection} ->
  266:             ok
  267:     end,
  268:     check_process_demonitor(self(), TP1, R1),
  269:     R2 = erlang:monitor(process, TP1),
  270:     receive
  271:         {'DOWN',R2,process,TP1O,noconnection} ->
  272:             ok
  273:     end,
  274:     check_process_demonitor(self(), TP1, R2),
  275:     ok.
  276: 
  277: 
  278: common_process_monitors(NodeA, NodeB) ->
  279:     TP1 = spawn(NodeA, ?MODULE, test_proc, []),
  280:     TP2 = spawn(NodeB, ?MODULE, test_proc, []),
  281:     run_common_process_monitors(TP1, TP2),
  282:     TP3 = spawn(NodeA, ?MODULE, test_proc, []),
  283:     TP4 = spawn(NodeB, ?MODULE, test_proc, []),
  284:     TP4N = list_to_atom(lists:concat([?FUNCTION_NAME,
  285:         integer_to_list(erlang:unique_integer([positive]))])),
  286:     true = tp_call(TP4, fun () -> register(TP4N,self()) end),
  287:     run_common_process_monitors(TP3,
  288:                                 case node() == node(TP4) of
  289:                                     true -> TP4N;
  290:                                     false -> {TP4N, node(TP4)}
  291:                                 end),
  292:     ok.
  293: 
  294: run_common_process_monitors(TP1, TP2) ->
  295:     R1 = tp_call(TP1, fun () -> erlang:monitor(process, TP2) end),
  296:     check_process_monitor(TP1, TP2, R1),
  297: 
  298:     tp_call(TP2, fun () -> catch erlang:demonitor(R1) end),
  299:     check_process_monitor(TP1, TP2, R1),
  300: 
  301:     true = tp_call(TP1, fun () -> erlang:demonitor(R1) end),
  302:     check_process_demonitor(TP1, TP2, R1),
  303: 
  304:     R2 = tp_call(TP1, fun () -> erlang:monitor(process, TP2) end),
  305:     TP2O = get_down_object(TP2, TP1),
  306:     check_process_monitor(TP1, TP2, R2),
  307:     tp_cast(TP2, fun () -> exit(bye) end),
  308:     wait_until(fun () -> is_proc_dead(TP2) end),
  309:     ok = tp_call(TP1, fun () ->
  310:                               receive
  311:                                   {'DOWN',R2,process,TP2O,Reason1} ->
  312:                                       bye = Reason1,
  313:                                       ok
  314:                               end
  315:                       end),
  316:     check_process_demonitor(TP1, TP2, R2),
  317: 
  318:     R3 = tp_call(TP1, fun () -> erlang:monitor(process, TP2) end),
  319:     ok = tp_call(TP1, fun () ->
  320:                               receive
  321:                                   {'DOWN',R3,process,TP2O,Reason2} ->
  322:                                       noproc = Reason2,
  323:                                       ok
  324:                               end
  325:                       end),
  326:     check_process_demonitor(TP1, TP2, R3),
  327: 
  328:     tp_cast(TP1, fun () -> exit(normal) end),
  329:     wait_until(fun () -> is_proc_dead(TP1) end),
  330:     ok.
  331: 
  332: 
  333: %% Tests distributed monitor/2, demonitor/1, and 'DOWN' message
  334: %% over busy distribution port
  335: busy_dist_port_monitor(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  336: 
  337:     Tracer = case os:getenv("TRACE_BUSY_DIST_PORT") of
  338:                  "true" -> start_busy_dist_port_tracer();
  339:                  _ -> false
  340:              end,
  341: 
  342:     {ok, PeerA, A} = ?CT_PEER(),
  343:     TP1 = spawn(A, ?MODULE, test_proc, []),
  344:     %% Check monitor over busy port
  345:     M1 = suspend_on_busy_test(A,
  346:                               "erlang:monitor(process, TP1)",
  347:                               fun () -> erlang:monitor(process, TP1) end),
  348:     check_process_monitor(self(), TP1, M1),
  349:     %% Check demonitor over busy port
  350:     suspend_on_busy_test(A,
  351:                          "erlang:demonitor(M1)",
  352:                          fun () -> erlang:demonitor(M1) end),
  353:     check_process_demonitor(self(), TP1, M1),
  354:     %% Check down message over busy port
  355:     TP2 = spawn(?MODULE, test_proc, []),
  356:     M2 = tp_call(TP1, fun () -> erlang:monitor(process, TP2) end),
  357:     check_process_monitor(TP1, TP2, M2),
  358:     Ref = make_ref(),
  359:     Busy = make_busy(A, 1000),
  360:     receive after 100 -> ok end,
  361:     tp_cast(TP2, fun () -> exit(Ref) end),
  362:     receive after 100 -> ok end,
  363:     unmake_busy(Busy),
  364:     Ref = tp_call(TP1, fun () ->
  365:                                receive
  366:                                    {'DOWN', M2, process, TP2, Ref} ->
  367:                                        Ref
  368:                                end
  369:                        end),
  370:     tp_cast(TP1, fun () -> exit(normal) end),
  371:     peer:stop(PeerA),
  372:     stop_busy_dist_port_tracer(Tracer),
  373:     ok.
  374: 
  375: %% Tests distributed link/1, unlink/1, and 'EXIT'
  376: %% message over busy distribution port
  377: busy_dist_port_link(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  378:     Tracer = case os:getenv("TRACE_BUSY_DIST_PORT") of
  379:                  "true" -> start_busy_dist_port_tracer();
  380:                  _ -> false
  381:              end,
  382: 
  383:     {ok, PeerA, A} = ?CT_PEER(),
  384:     TP1 = spawn(A, ?MODULE, test_proc, []),
  385:     %% Check link over busy port
  386:     suspend_on_busy_test(A,
  387:                          "link(TP1)",
  388:                          fun () -> link(TP1) end),
  389:     check_link(self(), TP1),
  390:     %% Check unlink over busy port
  391:     suspend_on_busy_test(A,
  392:                          "unlink(TP1)",
  393:                          fun () -> unlink(TP1) end),
  394:     check_unlink(self(), TP1),
  395:     %% Check trap exit message over busy port
  396:     TP2 = spawn(?MODULE, test_proc, []),
  397:     ok = tp_call(TP1, fun () ->
  398:                               process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  399:                               link(TP2),
  400:                               ok
  401:                       end),
  402:     check_link(TP1, TP2),
  403:     Ref = make_ref(),
  404:     Busy = make_busy(A, 1000),
  405:     receive after 100 -> ok end,
  406:     tp_cast(TP2, fun () -> exit(Ref) end),
  407:     receive after 100 -> ok end,
  408:     unmake_busy(Busy),
  409:     Ref = tp_call(TP1, fun () ->
  410:                                receive
  411:                                    {'EXIT', TP2, Ref} ->
  412:                                        Ref
  413:                                end
  414:                        end),
  415:     tp_cast(TP1, fun () -> exit(normal) end),
  416:     peer:stop(PeerA),
  417:     stop_busy_dist_port_tracer(Tracer),
  418:     ok.
  419: 
  420: 
  421: otp_5772_link(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  422:     otp_5772_link_test(node()).
  423: 
  424: otp_5772_dist_link(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  425:     {ok, PeerA, A} = ?CT_PEER(),
  426:     otp_5772_link_test(A),
  427:     peer:stop(PeerA).
  428: 
  429: otp_5772_link_test(Node) ->
  430:     Prio = process_flag(priority, high),
  431:     TE = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  432:     TP1 = spawn_opt(Node, ?MODULE, test_proc, [],
  433:                     [link, {priority, low}]),
  434:     exit(TP1, bang),
  435:     unlink(TP1),
  436:     receive
  437:         {'EXIT', TP1, _} ->
  438:             ok
  439:     after 0 ->
  440:               ok
  441:     end,
  442:     receive
  443:         {'EXIT', TP1, _} = Exit ->
  444:             ct:fail({got_late_exit_message, Exit})
  445:     after 1000 ->
  446:               ok
  447:     end,
  448:     process_flag(trap_exit, TE),
  449:     process_flag(priority, Prio),
  450:     ok.
  451: 
  452: otp_5772_monitor(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  453:     otp_5772_monitor_test(node()).
  454: 
  455: otp_5772_dist_monitor(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  456:     {ok, PeerA, A} = ?CT_PEER(),
  457:     otp_5772_monitor_test(A),
  458:     peer:stop(PeerA).
  459: 
  460: otp_5772_monitor_test(Node) ->
  461:     Prio = process_flag(priority, high),
  462:     TP1 = spawn_opt(Node, ?MODULE, test_proc, [], [{priority, low}]),
  463:     M1 = erlang:monitor(process, TP1),
  464:     exit(TP1, bang),
  465:     erlang:demonitor(M1),
  466:     receive
  467:         {'DOWN', M1, _, _, _} ->
  468:             ok
  469:     after 0 ->
  470:               ok
  471:     end,
  472:     receive
  473:         {'DOWN', M1, _, _, _} = Down ->
  474:             ct:fail({got_late_down_message, Down})
  475:     after 1000 ->
  476:               ok
  477:     end,
  478:     process_flag(priority, Prio),
  479:     ok.
  480: 
  481: otp_7946(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  482:     {ok, _Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
  483:     Proc = rpc:call(Node, erlang, whereis, [net_kernel]),
  484:     Mon = erlang:monitor(process, Proc),
  485:     rpc:cast(Node, erlang, halt, []),
  486:     receive {'DOWN', Mon, process, Proc , _} -> ok end,
  487:     {Linker, LMon} = spawn_monitor(fun () ->
  488:                                            link(Proc),
  489:                                            receive
  490:                                            after infinity -> ok
  491:                                            end
  492:                                    end),
  493:     receive
  494:         {'DOWN', LMon, process, Linker, Reason} ->
  495:             io:format("Reason=~p~n", [Reason]),
  496:             Reason = noconnection
  497:     end.
  498: 
  499: otp_17127_local_link_with_simultaneous_link_unlink(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  500:     otp_17127_link_with_simultaneous_link_unlink_test(node(), node()).
  501: 
  502: otp_17127_dist_link_with_simultaneous_link_unlink(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  503:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
  504:     Res = otp_17127_link_with_simultaneous_link_unlink_test(node(), Node),
  505:     peer:stop(Peer),
  506:     Res.
  507: 
  508: otp_17127_link_with_simultaneous_link_unlink_test(NodeA, NodeB) ->
  509:     FunA = fun (Other) ->
  510:                    link(Other)
  511:            end,
  512:     FunB = fun (Other) ->
  513:                    link(Other),
  514:                    unlink(Other)
  515:            end,
  516:     otp_17127_test(NodeA, FunA, NodeB, FunB).
  517: 
  518: otp_17127_local_random(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  519:     otp_17127_random_test(node(), node(), 100).
  520: 
  521: otp_17127_dist_random(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  522:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
  523:     rpc:call(Node, erts_debug, set_internal_state, [available_internal_state, true]),
  524:     Res = otp_17127_random_test(node(), Node, 20),
  525:     peer:stop(Peer),
  526:     Res.
  527: 
  528: otp_17127_random_test(_NodeA, _NodeB, 0) ->
  529:     ok;
  530: otp_17127_random_test(NodeA, NodeB, N) ->
  531:     Fun = fun (Other) ->
  532:                   rand_proc(Other, rand:uniform(500))
  533:           end,
  534:     otp_17127_test(NodeA, Fun, NodeB, Fun),
  535:     otp_17127_random_test(NodeA, NodeB, N-1).
  536: 
  537: rand_proc(_Other, 0) ->
  538:     ok;
  539: rand_proc(Other, N) ->
  540:     case rand:uniform(3) of
  541:         1 -> link(Other);
  542:         2 -> unlink(Other);
  543:         3 -> erlang:yield()
  544:     end,
  545:     rand_proc(Other, N-1).
  546: 
  547: otp_17127_test(NodeA, FunA, NodeB, FunB) ->
  548:     process_flag(priority, high),
  549:     {SchedA, SchedB} = case NodeA == NodeB of
  550:                            false ->
  551:                                {[], []};
  552:                            true ->
  553:                                NS = erlang:system_info(schedulers_online),
  554:                                process_flag(scheduler, 1),
  555:                                {[{scheduler, (1 rem NS) + 1}],
  556:                                 [{scheduler, (2 rem NS) + 1}]}
  557:                        end,
  558:     A = spawn_opt(NodeA,
  559:                   fun () ->
  560:                           receive
  561:                               {go, Tester, Other, Later} ->
  562:                                   busy_wait_until(Later),
  563:                                   FunA(Other),
  564:                                   receive ping -> Other ! pong end,
  565:                                   receive pling -> ok end,
  566:                                   Tester ! {self(), done}
  567:                           end,
  568:                           receive after infinity -> ok end
  569:                   end, SchedA),
  570:     B = spawn_opt(NodeB,
  571:                   fun () ->
  572:                           receive
  573:                               {go, Tester, Other, Later} ->
  574:                                   busy_wait_until(Later),
  575:                                   FunB(Other),
  576:                                   Other ! ping,
  577:                                   receive pong -> Other ! pling end,
  578:                                   Tester ! {self(), done}
  579:                           end,
  580:                           receive after infinity -> ok end
  581:                   end, SchedB),
  582:     io:format("A = ~p~nB = ~p~n", [A, B]),
  583:     Later = case NodeA == NodeB of
  584:                 true ->
  585:                     GoTime = (erlang:monotonic_time()
  586:                               + erlang:convert_time_unit(100, millisecond, native)),
  587:                     fun () ->
  588:                             erlang:monotonic_time() >= GoTime
  589:                     end;
  590:                 false ->
  591:                     GoTime = (os:system_time(nanosecond)
  592:                               + erlang:convert_time_unit(500, millisecond, nanosecond)),
  593:                     fun () ->
  594:                             os:system_time(nanosecond) >= GoTime
  595:                     end
  596:             end,
  597:     erlang:yield(),
  598:     A ! {go, self(), B, Later},
  599:     B ! {go, self(), A, Later},
  600:     receive {A, done} -> ok end,
  601:     receive {B, done} -> ok end,
  602:     try
  603:         check_consistent_link_state(A, B),
  604:         true = rpc:call(node(A), erlang, is_process_alive, [A]),
  605:         true = rpc:call(node(B), erlang, is_process_alive, [B])
  606:     after
  607:         exit(A, kill),
  608:         exit(B, kill)
  609:     end.
  610: 
  611: %%
  612: %% -- Internal utils --------------------------------------------------------
  613: %%
  614: 
  615: -define(BUSY_DATA_KEY, '__busy__port__data__').
  616: -define(BUSY_DATA_SIZE, 1024*1024).
  617: 
  618: busy_data() ->
  619:     case get(?BUSY_DATA_KEY) of
  620:         undefined ->
  621:             set_busy_data([]);
  622:         Data ->
  623:             true = is_binary(Data),
  624:             true = size(Data) == ?BUSY_DATA_SIZE,
  625:             Data
  626:     end.
  627: 
  628: set_busy_data(SetData) ->
  629:     case get(?BUSY_DATA_KEY) of
  630:         undefined ->
  631:             Data = case SetData of
  632:                        D when is_binary(D), size(D) == ?BUSY_DATA_SIZE ->
  633:                            SetData;
  634:                        _ ->
  635:                            list_to_binary(lists:duplicate(?BUSY_DATA_SIZE, 253))
  636:                    end,
  637:             put(?BUSY_DATA_KEY, Data),
  638:             Data;
  639:         OldData ->
  640:             OldData
  641:     end.
  642: 
  643: freeze_node(Node, MS) ->
  644:     Own = 500,
  645:     DoingIt = make_ref(),
  646:     Freezer = self(),
  647:     spawn_link(Node,
  648:                fun () ->
  649:                        erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state,
  650:                                                      true),
  651:                        dctrl_dop_send(Freezer, DoingIt),
  652:                        receive after Own -> ok end,
  653:                        erts_debug:set_internal_state(block, MS+Own)
  654:                end),
  655:     receive DoingIt -> ok end,
  656:     receive after Own -> ok end.
  657: 
  658: make_busy(Node, Time) when is_integer(Time) ->
  659:     Own = 500,
  660:     freeze_node(Node, Time+Own), 
  661:     Data = busy_data(),
  662:     DCtrl = dctrl(Node),
  663:     %% first make port busy
  664:     Pid = spawn_link(fun () ->
  665:                              forever(fun () ->
  666:                                              dctrl_dop_reg_send(Node,
  667:                                                                 '__noone__',
  668:                                                                 Data)
  669:                                      end)
  670:                      end),
  671:     receive after Own -> ok end,
  672:     wait_until(fun () ->
  673:                   case {DCtrl, process_info(Pid, status)} of
  674:                       {DPrt, {status, suspended}} when is_port(DPrt) -> true;
  675:                       {DPid, {status, waiting}} when is_pid(DPid) -> true;
  676:                       _ -> false
  677:                   end
  678:                end),
  679:     %% then dist entry
  680:     make_busy(Node, [nosuspend], Data),
  681:     Pid.
  682: 
  683: make_busy(Node, Opts, Data) ->
  684:     case erlang:send({'__noone__', Node}, Data, Opts) of
  685:         nosuspend -> nosuspend;
  686:         _ -> make_busy(Node, Opts, Data)
  687:     end.
  688: 
  689: unmake_busy(Pid) ->
  690:     unlink(Pid),
  691:     exit(Pid, bang).
  692: 
  693: suspend_on_busy_test(Node, Doing, Fun) ->
  694:     Tester = self(),
  695:     DoIt = make_ref(),
  696:     Done = make_ref(),
  697:     Data = busy_data(),
  698:     spawn_link(fun () ->
  699:                        set_busy_data(Data),
  700:                        Busy = make_busy(Node, 1000),
  701:                        Tester ! DoIt,
  702:                        receive after 100 -> ok end,
  703:                        Info = process_info(Tester, [status, current_function]),
  704:                        unmake_busy(Busy),
  705:                        io:format("~p doing ~s: ~p~n", [Tester, Doing, Info]),
  706:                        Tester ! {Done, Info}
  707:                end),
  708:     receive DoIt -> ok end,
  709:     Res = Fun(),
  710:     receive
  711:         {Done, MyInfo} ->
  712:             %% Don't match arity; it is different in
  713:             %% debug and optimized emulator
  714:             [{status, suspended},
  715:              {current_function, {erlang, bif_return_trap, _}}] = MyInfo,
  716:             ok
  717:     end,
  718:     Res.
  719: 
  720: % get_node(Name) when is_atom(Name) ->
  721: %     node();
  722: % get_node({Name, Node}) when is_atom(Name) ->
  723: %     Node;
  724: % get_node(NC) when is_pid(NC); is_port(NC); is_reference(NC) ->
  725: %     node(NC).
  726: 
  727: get_down_object(Item, _) when is_pid(Item) ->
  728:     Item;
  729: get_down_object({Name, Node} = Item, _) when is_atom(Name); is_atom(Node) ->
  730:     Item;
  731: get_down_object(Item, Watcher) when is_atom(Item), is_pid(Watcher) ->
  732:     {Item, node(Watcher)};
  733: get_down_object(Item, {_,Node}) when is_atom(Item), is_atom(Node) ->
  734:     {Item, Node};
  735: get_down_object(Item, Watcher) when is_atom(Item), is_atom(Watcher) ->
  736:     {Item, node()}.
  737: 
  738: is_proc_dead(P) ->
  739:     case is_proc_alive(P) of
  740:         true -> false;
  741:         false -> true
  742:     end.
  743: 
  744: is_proc_alive(Pid) when is_pid(Pid), node(Pid) == node() ->
  745:     is_process_alive(Pid);
  746: is_proc_alive(Name) when is_atom(Name) ->
  747:     case catch whereis(Name) of
  748:         Pid when is_pid(Pid) ->
  749:             is_proc_alive(Pid);
  750:         _ ->
  751:             false
  752:     end;
  753: is_proc_alive({Name, Node}) when is_atom(Name), Node == node() ->
  754:     is_proc_alive(Name);
  755: is_proc_alive(Proc) ->
  756:     is_remote_proc_alive(Proc).
  757: 
  758: is_remote_proc_alive({Name, Node}) when is_atom(Name), is_atom(Node) ->
  759:     is_remote_proc_alive(Name, Node);
  760: is_remote_proc_alive(Pid) when is_pid(Pid) ->
  761:     is_remote_proc_alive(Pid, node(Pid));
  762: is_remote_proc_alive(_) ->
  763:     false.
  764: 
  765: is_remote_proc_alive(PN, Node) ->		 
  766:     S = self(),
  767:     R = make_ref(),
  768:     monitor_node(Node, true),
  769:     _P = spawn(Node, fun () -> S ! {R, is_proc_alive(PN)} end),
  770:     receive
  771:         {R, Bool} ->
  772:             monitor_node(Node, false),
  773:             Bool;
  774:         {nodedown, Node} ->
  775:             false
  776:     end.
  777: 
  778: wait_until(Fun) ->
  779:     case Fun() of
  780:         true ->
  781:             ok;
  782:         _ ->
  783:             receive
  784:             after 100 ->
  785:                       wait_until(Fun)
  786:             end
  787:     end.
  788: 
  789: busy_wait_until(Fun) ->
  790:     case Fun() of
  791:         true -> ok;
  792:         _ ->
  793:             busy_wait_until(Fun)
  794:     end.
  795: 
  796: forever(Fun) ->
  797:     Fun(),
  798:     forever(Fun).
  799: 
  800: tp_call(Tp, Fun) ->
  801:     R = make_ref(),
  802:     Tp ! {call, self(), R, Fun},
  803:     receive
  804:         {R, Res} ->
  805:             Res
  806:     end.
  807: 
  808: tp_cast(Tp, Fun) ->
  809:     Tp ! {cast, Fun}.
  810: 
  811: test_proc() ->
  812:     receive
  813:         {call, From, Ref, Fun} ->
  814:             From ! {Ref, Fun()};
  815:         {cast, Fun} ->
  816:             Fun()
  817:     end,
  818:     test_proc().
  819: 
  820: get_local_link_list(Obj) ->
  821:     case catch erts_debug:get_internal_state({link_list, Obj}) of
  822:         LL when is_list(LL) ->
  823:             LL;
  824:         _ ->
  825:             []
  826:     end.
  827: 
  828: get_remote_link_list(Node, Obj) ->
  829:     case catch rpc:call(Node, erts_debug, get_internal_state,
  830:                         [{link_list, Obj}]) of
  831:         LL when is_list(LL) ->
  832:             LL;
  833:         _ ->
  834:             []
  835:     end.
  836: 
  837: 
  838: get_link_list({Node, DistEntry}) when Node == node(), is_atom(DistEntry) ->
  839:     get_local_link_list(DistEntry);
  840: get_link_list({Node, DistEntry}) when is_atom(Node), is_atom(DistEntry) ->
  841:     get_remote_link_list(Node, DistEntry);
  842: get_link_list(P) when is_pid(P); is_port(P) ->
  843:     case node(P) of
  844:         Node when Node == node() ->
  845:             get_local_link_list(P);
  846:         Node ->
  847:             get_remote_link_list(Node, P)
  848:     end;
  849: get_link_list(undefined) ->
  850:     [].
  851: 
  852: get_local_monitor_list(Obj) ->
  853:     case catch erts_debug:get_internal_state({monitor_list, Obj}) of
  854:         LL when is_list(LL) ->
  855:             LL;
  856:         _ ->
  857:             []
  858:     end.
  859: 
  860: get_remote_monitor_list(Node, Obj) ->
  861:     case catch rpc:call(Node, erts_debug, get_internal_state,
  862:                         [{monitor_list, Obj}]) of
  863:         LL when is_list(LL) ->
  864:             LL;
  865:         _ ->
  866:             []
  867:     end.
  868: 
  869: 
  870: get_monitor_list({Node, DistEntry}) when Node == node(), is_atom(DistEntry) ->
  871:     get_local_monitor_list(DistEntry);
  872: get_monitor_list({Node, DistEntry}) when is_atom(Node), is_atom(DistEntry) ->
  873:     get_remote_monitor_list(Node, DistEntry);
  874: get_monitor_list(P) when is_pid(P) ->
  875:     case node(P) of
  876:         Node when Node == node() ->
  877:             get_local_monitor_list(P);
  878:         Node ->
  879:             get_remote_monitor_list(Node, P)
  880:     end;
  881: get_monitor_list(undefined) ->
  882:     [].
  883: 
  884: 
  885: find_erl_monitor(Pid, Ref) when is_reference(Ref) ->
  886:     MonitorList = get_monitor_list(Pid),
  887:     io:format("~p MonitorList: ~p~n", [Pid, MonitorList]),
  888:     lists:foldl(fun (#erl_monitor{ref = R} = EL, Acc) when R == Ref ->
  889:                         [EL|Acc];
  890:                     (_, Acc) ->
  891:                         Acc
  892:                 end,
  893:                 [],
  894:                 MonitorList);
  895: find_erl_monitor(Pid, Item) ->
  896:     MonitorList = get_monitor_list(Pid),
  897:     io:format("~p MonitorList: ~p~n", [Pid, MonitorList]),
  898:     lists:foldl(fun (#erl_monitor{pid = I} = EL, Acc) when I == Item ->
  899:                         [EL|Acc];
  900:                     (_, Acc) ->
  901:                         Acc
  902:                 end,
  903:                 [],
  904:                 MonitorList).
  905: 
  906: 
  907: find_erl_link(Obj, Type, Item) when is_pid(Item); is_port(Item) -> 
  908:     LinkList = get_link_list(Obj),
  909:     io:format("~p LinkList: ~p~n", [Obj, LinkList]),
  910:     lists:foldl(fun (#erl_link{type = T, pid = I, state = linked} = EL,
  911:                      Acc) when T == Type, I == Item ->
  912:                         [EL|Acc];
  913:                     ({erl_link, T, P, I},
  914:                      Acc) when T == Type, P == Item ->
  915:                         %% Old emulator without state (linked if record exists)...
  916:                         [#erl_link{type = T, pid = P, id = I, state = linked}|Acc];
  917:                     (_, Acc) ->
  918:                         Acc
  919:                 end,
  920:                 [],
  921:                 LinkList);
  922: find_erl_link(Obj, Type, Id) when is_integer(Id) -> 
  923:     %% Find by Id
  924:     LinkList = get_link_list(Obj),
  925:     io:format("~p LinkList: ~p~n", [Obj, LinkList]),
  926:     lists:foldl(fun (#erl_link{type = T, id = I, state = linked} = EL,
  927:                      Acc) when T == Type, I == Id ->
  928:                         [EL|Acc];
  929:                     ({erl_link, T, P, I},
  930:                      Acc) when T == Type, I == Id ->
  931:                         %% Old emulator without state (linked if record exists)...
  932:                         [#erl_link{type = T, pid = P, id = I, state = linked}|Acc];
  933:                     (_, Acc) ->
  934:                         Acc
  935:                 end,
  936:                 [],
  937:                 LinkList).
  938: 
  939: 
  940: get_link_type(A, B) when is_port(A);
  941:                          is_port(B) ->
  942:     port;
  943: get_link_type(A, B) when is_pid(A),
  944:                          is_pid(B) ->
  945:     case node(A) == node(B) of
  946:         true ->
  947:             process;
  948:         false ->
  949:             dist_process
  950:     end.
  951: 
  952: check_consistent_link_state(A, B) ->
  953:     %% Both processes should agree on whether
  954:     %% they are linked or not...
  955:     LinkType = get_link_type(A, B),
  956:     case find_erl_link(A, LinkType, B) of
  957:         [] ->
  958:             check_unlink(A, B),
  959:             io:format("~p and ~p are not linked~n", [A, B]);
  960:         _ ->
  961:             check_link(A, B),
  962:             io:format("~p and ~p are linked~n", [A, B])
  963:     end.
  964: 
  965: check_link(A, B) when node(A) == node(B) ->
  966:     LinkType = get_link_type(A, B),
  967:     [#erl_link{type = LinkType,
  968:                pid = B}] = find_erl_link(A, LinkType, B),
  969:     [#erl_link{type = LinkType,
  970:                pid = A}] = find_erl_link(B, LinkType, A),
  971:     [] = find_erl_link({node(A), node(B)},
  972:                        LinkType,
  973:                        A),
  974:     [] = find_erl_link({node(B), node(A)},
  975:                        LinkType,
  976:                        B),
  977:     ok;
  978: check_link(A, B) ->
  979:     [#erl_link{type = dist_process,
  980:                pid = B,
  981:                id = IdA}] = find_erl_link(A, dist_process, B),
  982:     [#erl_link{type = dist_process,
  983:                pid = A,
  984:                id = IdA}] = find_erl_link({node(A),
  985:                                            node(B)},
  986:                                           dist_process,
  987:                                           IdA),
  988:     [#erl_link{type = dist_process,
  989:                pid = A,
  990:                id = IdB}] = find_erl_link(B, dist_process, A),
  991:     [#erl_link{type = dist_process,
  992:                pid = B,
  993:                id = IdB}] = find_erl_link({node(B),
  994:                                            node(A)},
  995:                                           dist_process,
  996:                                           IdB),
  997:     ok.
  998: 
  999: check_unlink(A, B) ->
 1000:     LinkType = get_link_type(A, B),
 1001:     [] = find_erl_link(A, LinkType, B),
 1002:     [] = find_erl_link(B, LinkType, A),
 1003:     [] = find_erl_link({node(A), node(B)}, dist_process, A),
 1004:     [] = find_erl_link({node(B), node(A)}, dist_process, B),
 1005:     ok.
 1006: 
 1007: check_process_monitor(From, {Name, Node}, Ref) when is_pid(From),
 1008:                                                     is_atom(Name),
 1009:                                                     Node == node(From),
 1010:                                                     is_reference(Ref) ->
 1011:     check_process_monitor(From, Name, Ref);
 1012: check_process_monitor(From, {Name, Node}, Ref) when is_pid(From),
 1013:                                                     is_atom(Name),
 1014:                                                     is_atom(Node),
 1015:                                                     is_reference(Ref) ->
 1016:     MonitoredPid = rpc:call(Node, erlang, whereis, [Name]),
 1017:     [#erl_monitor{type = dist_process,
 1018:                   dir = origin,
 1019:                   ref = Ref,
 1020:                   pid = Node,
 1021:                   extra = Name}] = find_erl_monitor(From, Ref),
 1022:     [#erl_monitor{type = dist_process,
 1023:                   dir = target,
 1024:                   ref = Ref,
 1025:                   pid = From,
 1026:                   extra = Name}] = find_erl_monitor({node(From), Node}, Ref),
 1027:     [#erl_monitor{type = dist_process,
 1028:                   dir = origin,
 1029:                   ref = Ref,
 1030:                   pid = MonitoredPid,
 1031:                   extra = Name}] = find_erl_monitor({Node, node(From)}, Ref),
 1032:     [#erl_monitor{type = dist_process,
 1033:                   dir = target,
 1034:                   ref = Ref,
 1035:                   pid = From,
 1036:                   extra = Name}] = find_erl_monitor(MonitoredPid, Ref),
 1037:     ok;
 1038: check_process_monitor(From, Name, Ref) when is_pid(From),
 1039:                                             is_atom(Name),
 1040:                                             undefined /= Name,
 1041:                                             is_reference(Ref) ->
 1042:     MonitoredPid = rpc:call(node(From), erlang, whereis, [Name]),
 1043: 
 1044:     [#erl_monitor{type = process,
 1045:                   dir = origin,
 1046:                   ref = Ref,
 1047:                   pid = MonitoredPid,
 1048:                   extra = Name}] = find_erl_monitor(From, Ref),
 1049: 
 1050: 
 1051:     [#erl_monitor{type = process,
 1052:                   dir = target,
 1053:                   ref = Ref,
 1054:                   pid = From,
 1055:                   extra = Name}] = find_erl_monitor(MonitoredPid,Ref),
 1056:     ok;
 1057: check_process_monitor(From, To, Ref) when is_pid(From),
 1058:                                           is_pid(To),
 1059:                                           is_reference(Ref) ->
 1060:     MonType = case node(From) == node(To) of
 1061:                   true -> process;
 1062:                   false -> dist_process
 1063:               end,
 1064: 
 1065:     OriMon = [#erl_monitor{type = MonType,
 1066:                            dir = origin,
 1067:                            ref = Ref,
 1068:                            pid = To}],
 1069: 
 1070:     OriMon = find_erl_monitor(From, Ref), 
 1071: 
 1072:     TargMon = [#erl_monitor{type = MonType,
 1073:                             dir = target,
 1074:                             ref = Ref,
 1075:                             pid = From}],
 1076:     TargMon = find_erl_monitor(To, Ref),
 1077: 
 1078: 
 1079:     case node(From) == node(To) of
 1080:         false ->
 1081:             DistTargMon = [#erl_monitor{type = dist_process,
 1082:                                         dir = target,
 1083:                                         ref = Ref,
 1084:                                         pid = From}],
 1085:             DistTargMon = find_erl_monitor({node(From), node(To)}, Ref),
 1086:             OriMon = find_erl_monitor({node(To), node(From)}, Ref);
 1087:         true ->
 1088:             [] = find_erl_monitor({node(From), node(From)}, Ref)
 1089:     end,
 1090:     ok.
 1091: 
 1092: 
 1093: check_process_demonitor(From, {undefined, Node}, Ref) when is_pid(From),
 1094:                                                            is_reference(Ref) ->
 1095:     [] = find_erl_monitor(From, Ref),
 1096:     case node(From) == Node of
 1097:         false ->
 1098:             [] = find_erl_monitor({node(From), Node}, Ref),
 1099:             [] = find_erl_monitor({Node, node(From)}, Ref);
 1100:         true ->
 1101:             [] = find_erl_monitor({Node, Node}, Ref)
 1102:     end,
 1103:     ok;
 1104: check_process_demonitor(From, {Name, Node}, Ref) when is_pid(From),
 1105:                                                       is_atom(Name),
 1106:                                                       Node == node(From),
 1107:                                                       is_reference(Ref) ->
 1108:     MonitoredPid = rpc:call(Node, erlang, whereis, [Name]),
 1109:     case rpc:call(Node, erlang, whereis, [Name]) of
 1110:         undefined ->
 1111:             check_process_demonitor(From, {undefined, Node}, Ref);
 1112:         MonitoredPid ->
 1113:             check_process_demonitor(From, MonitoredPid, Ref)
 1114:     end;
 1115: check_process_demonitor(From, {Name, Node}, Ref) when is_pid(From),
 1116:                                                       is_atom(Name),
 1117:                                                       is_atom(Node),
 1118:                                                       is_reference(Ref) ->
 1119:     MonitoredPid = rpc:call(Node, erlang, whereis, [Name]),
 1120:     [] = find_erl_monitor(From, Ref),
 1121:     [] = find_erl_monitor({node(From), Node}, Ref),
 1122:     [] = find_erl_monitor({Node, node(From)}, Ref),
 1123:     [] = find_erl_monitor(MonitoredPid, Ref),
 1124:     ok;
 1125: check_process_demonitor(From, undefined, Ref) when is_pid(From),
 1126:                                                    is_reference(Ref) ->
 1127:     [] = find_erl_monitor(From, Ref),
 1128:     case node(From) == node() of
 1129:         false ->
 1130:             [] = find_erl_monitor({node(From), node()}, Ref),
 1131:             [] = find_erl_monitor({node(), node(From)}, Ref);
 1132:         true ->
 1133:             [] = find_erl_monitor({node(), node()}, Ref)
 1134:     end,
 1135:     ok;
 1136: check_process_demonitor(From, Name, Ref) when is_pid(From),
 1137:                                               is_atom(Name),
 1138:                                               undefined /= Name,
 1139:                                               is_reference(Ref) ->
 1140:     check_process_demonitor(From, {Name, node()}, Ref);
 1141: check_process_demonitor(From, To, Ref) when is_pid(From),
 1142:                                             is_pid(To),
 1143:                                             is_reference(Ref) ->
 1144:     [] = find_erl_monitor(From, Ref),
 1145:     [] = find_erl_monitor(To, Ref),
 1146:     case node(From) == node(To) of
 1147:         false ->
 1148:             [] = find_erl_monitor({node(From), node(To)}, Ref),
 1149:             [] = find_erl_monitor({node(To), node(From)}, Ref);
 1150:         true ->
 1151:             [] = find_erl_monitor({node(From), node(From)}, Ref)
 1152:     end,
 1153:     ok.
 1154: 
 1155: no_of_monitor_node(From, Node) when is_pid(From), is_atom(Node) ->
 1156:     case find_erl_monitor(From, Node) of
 1157:         [] -> 0;
 1158:         [#erl_monitor{type = node,
 1159:                       dir = origin,
 1160:                       pid = Node,
 1161:                       extra = N}] -> N
 1162:     end.
 1163: 
 1164: check_monitor_node(From, Node, 0) when is_pid(From),
 1165:                                         is_atom(Node) ->
 1166:     [] = find_erl_monitor(From, Node),
 1167:     [] = find_erl_monitor({node(From), Node}, From);
 1168: check_monitor_node(From, Node, No) when is_pid(From),
 1169:                                         is_atom(Node),
 1170:                                         is_integer(No),
 1171:                                         No > 0 ->
 1172:     [#erl_monitor{type = node,
 1173:                   dir = origin,
 1174:                   pid = Node,
 1175:                   extra = No}] = find_erl_monitor(From, Node),
 1176:     [#erl_monitor{type = node,
 1177:                   dir = target,
 1178:                   pid = From}] = find_erl_monitor({node(From), Node}, From).
 1179: 
 1180: -define(COOKIE, '').
 1181: -define(DOP_LINK,		1).
 1182: -define(DOP_SEND,		2).
 1183: -define(DOP_EXIT,		3).
 1184: -define(DOP_UNLINK,		4).
 1185: -define(DOP_REG_SEND,		6).
 1186: -define(DOP_GROUP_LEADER,	7).
 1187: -define(DOP_EXIT2,		8).
 1188: 
 1189: -define(DOP_SEND_TT,		12).
 1190: -define(DOP_EXIT_TT,		13).
 1191: -define(DOP_REG_SEND_TT,	16).
 1192: -define(DOP_EXIT2_TT,		18).
 1193: 
 1194: -define(DOP_MONITOR_P,		19).
 1195: -define(DOP_DEMONITOR_P,	20).
 1196: -define(DOP_MONITOR_P_EXIT,	21).
 1197: 
 1198: ensure_dctrl(Node) ->
 1199:     case dctrl(Node) of
 1200:         undefined ->
 1201:             pong = net_adm:ping(Node),
 1202:             dctrl(Node);
 1203:         DCtrl ->
 1204:             DCtrl
 1205:     end.
 1206: 
 1207: dctrl_send(DPrt, Data) when is_port(DPrt) ->
 1208:     port_command(DPrt, Data);
 1209: dctrl_send(DPid, Data) when is_pid(DPid) ->
 1210:     Ref = make_ref(),
 1211:     DPid ! {send, self(), Ref, Data},
 1212:     receive {Ref, Res} -> Res end.
 1213: 
 1214: dctrl_dop_send(To, Msg) ->
 1215:     dctrl_send(ensure_dctrl(node(To)),
 1216:                [dmsg_hdr(),
 1217:                 dmsg_ext({?DOP_SEND,
 1218:                           ?COOKIE,
 1219:                           To}),
 1220:                 dmsg_ext(Msg)]).
 1221: 
 1222: dctrl_dop_reg_send(Node, Name, Msg) ->
 1223:     dctrl_send(ensure_dctrl(Node),
 1224:                [dmsg_hdr(),
 1225:                 dmsg_ext({?DOP_REG_SEND,
 1226:                           self(),
 1227:                           ?COOKIE,
 1228:                           Name}),
 1229:                 dmsg_ext(Msg)]).
 1230: 
 1231: dctrl(Node) when is_atom(Node) ->
 1232:     case catch erts_debug:get_internal_state(available_internal_state) of
 1233:         true -> true;
 1234:         _ -> erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, true)
 1235:     end,
 1236:     erts_debug:get_internal_state({dist_ctrl, Node}).
 1237: 
 1238: dmsg_hdr() ->
 1239:     [131, % Version Magic
 1240:      $D,  % Dist header
 1241:      0].  % No atom cache references
 1242: 
 1243: dmsg_ext(Term) ->	
 1244:     <<131, Res/binary>> = term_to_binary(Term),
 1245:     Res.
 1246: 
 1247: start_busy_dist_port_tracer() ->
 1248:     Tracer = spawn_link(fun () -> busy_dist_port_tracer() end),
 1249:     erlang:system_monitor(Tracer, [busy_dist_port]),
 1250:     Tracer.
 1251: 
 1252: stop_busy_dist_port_tracer(Tracer) when is_pid(Tracer) ->
 1253:     unlink(Tracer),
 1254:     exit(Tracer, bye);
 1255: stop_busy_dist_port_tracer(_) ->
 1256:     true.
 1257: 
 1258: busy_dist_port_tracer() ->
 1259:     receive
 1260:         {monitor, _SuspendedProcess, busy_dist_port, _Port} = M ->
 1261:             erlang:display(M),
 1262:             busy_dist_port_tracer()
 1263:     end.
